HiddenCheckpointWarning.synopsis: The guard warns you to stay away back. If the primary guard is dead, he will instead let you in or attack.
HiddenCheckpointWarning.how_to_trigger: Try to bypass the hidden Creche checkpoint. Input "oe cre_voss_friendly" and "oe cre_voss_hostile" as debug commands respectively to test the different Voss permutations ("oe cre_voss_skipped" clears both tags).

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter.synopsis: Hidden guards chatting while on duty.
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically for the hidden guards

AD_MainCheckpointChatter.synopsis: Main guards chatting while on duty. One intelligence officer, one normal Creche Y'llek guard.
AD_MainCheckpointChatter.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically for the main guards checkpoint

MainCheckpointTrespassing.synopsis: The guards can be convinced to let you in if you are Gith-looking, produce the box, or persuade them you have a reason to be at the creche.
MainCheckpointTrespassing.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the main checkpoint guards.  Input "oe cre_voss_friendly" and "oe cre_voss_hostile" as debug commands respectively to test the different Voss permutations ("oe cre_voss_skipped" clears both tags).

MainCheckpointWarning.synopsis: The guard warns you to stay away from the gates. If the primary guard is dead, he will instead let you in or attack.
MainCheckpointWarning.how_to_trigger: Go near the gates at the main Creche checkpoint in the upper creche.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing.synopsis: The guards can be convinced to let you in if you are Gith-looking or have obtained the insignia.
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing.how_to_trigger: Get spotted by the hidden checkpoint guards.  Input "oe cre_voss_friendly" and "oe cre_voss_hostile" as debug commands respectively to test the different Voss permutations ("oe cre_voss_skipped" clears both tags).

automatic_ordering.reasoning: When entering Baldur’s Gate 3’s Creche area, there are two distinct checkpoint routes – the main and the hidden – each with its own set of dialogues. In each route, the player is first met with a warning dialogue as they approach (either MainCheckpointWarning or HiddenCheckpointWarning). These warnings act as an early notice: if the player’s actions later result in being detected, a follow‐up trespassing dialogue will trigger (MainCheckpointTrespassing or HiddenCheckpointTrespassing). In other words, for the main checkpoint the warning dialogue must occur before any trespassing dialogue, and similarly for the hidden checkpoint, the warning precedes trespassing. Additionally, since the player generally takes one route or the other, the main checkpoint events (warning and trespassing) are mutually exclusive with the hidden checkpoint events.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_11.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_11.text: Leave me alone. The watch must remain undisturbed.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_12.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_12.text: I must return to my duty. Walk well, ra'stil.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_15.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_15.context: NodeContext: Pronouced "Iss-tick", meaning outsider/non gith - preparing to attack

HiddenCheckpointWarning_9.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointWarning_9.text: I have business with your Kith'rak. Stand aside.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_7.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_7.text: That will be for her to decide. Go to her directly. Do not stray.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_18.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointWarning_18.text: Kith'rak Voss sent me to find a weapon of our kin. I have it.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_10.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_10.text: Kith'rak Voss sent you directly? Chk. We are never informed first.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_13.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_13.text: But if this is true, you do our crèche a great honour. Report to Kith'rak Therezzyn inside.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_21.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointWarning_21.text: I have the item you're searching for. Captain Voss asked me to find it.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_16.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_16.text: Fine. Enter. If you are lying, Kith'rak Therezzyn will make short work of you.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_8.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointWarning_8.text: I have the githyanki item Captain Voss was hunting for.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_19.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_19.text: And you didn't hand it over? Interesting.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_0.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointWarning_0.text: A nautiloid crashed on your doorstep. Illithids are infecting the population. I need your help.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_4.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_4.text: Kith'rak Therezzyn shares your concerns. You should seek her within.

HiddenCheckpointWarning_5.speaker: Warrior Qen
HiddenCheckpointWarning_5.text: Wait. You should report to Kith'rak Therezzyn inside - you may be of use to her.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_1.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_1.text: Your powers of observation rival the Inquisitor himself, G'r'ath.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_15.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_15.text: I hope there are no more. This cavern would be the first to collapse.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_18.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_18.text: Might make this watch more exciting.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_8.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_8.text: Those students need to learn something of authority.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_10.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_10.text: What, will they not heed their jhe'stil?

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_12.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_12.text: They're not following orders. Poor conduct.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_5.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_5.text: That will not serve them well in battle with ghaik.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_9.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_9.text: If only the kith'rak saw my martial prowess, she'd make me a sarth.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_16.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_16.text: That's right G'r'ath. You're next on the list. That's why you're here, guarding nothing.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_17.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_17.text: Have faith, Qen. One day Vlaakith's light will shine upon us.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_2.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_2.text: I don't know. It is rather dark down here, ra'stil.
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_2.context: NodeContext: rah-still, meaning ally, sarcastic here

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_11.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_11.text: Do you remember that story we were told as yank?

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_14.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_14.text: Which one? 'The Sixth Arm of Tu'narath'? 'Voidseekers'? 'Myth and Gith'?

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_6.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_6.text: No, it was some war story.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_13.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_13.text: Used to love those - the ones about Kith'rak Voss were my favourite.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_19.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_19.text: I wasn't much better than the current stock when I was a yank.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_0.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_0.text: I was. Good job they beat the subversion out of you.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_7.speaker: Warrior Qen
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_7.text: Right G'r'ath. My life is infinitely better here, watching this back door.

AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_4.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
AD_HiddenCheckpointChatter_4.text: I'm not letting you bring me down. The kith'rak will appreciate me eventually.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_14.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_14.text: I hear even Silver Sword Voss has been drafted into the search.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_18.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_18.text: Voss? He's just a war myth for sa'varsh to teach the young ones.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_23.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_23.text: No! Kith'rak Voss is a hero.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_5.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_5.text: Hero. That could be confused for istik sentimentality.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_17.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_17.text: Your latest crop of yanki have been disrespecting their sa'varsh.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_28.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_28.text: I'd have never dreamed of such insubordination.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_32.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_32.text: It's an indictment of this entire crèche. It seems your sa'varsh has gotten sloppy.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_2.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_2.text: I'm sure your Inquisition has better things to do than castigate youths in training.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_12.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_12.text: I am not sure you are in a position to reflect on our motivations, vin'iisk.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_8.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_8.text: With your inquisitor gone, what authority do you claim over us?

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_16.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_16.text: Inquisitor or not, we still have a mission. The artefact remains unfound. Focus.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_20.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_20.text: Any word on the search for the artefact, ra'stil?

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_26.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_26.text: Loose words are food for ghaik spies. You should know better.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_7.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_7.text: Forgive me, we have not been visited by an inquisitor in an age. It is an honour.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_3.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_3.text: I would be more concerned than excited.
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_3.context: NodeContext: dripping with sarcasm and disdain

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_25.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_25.text: We have remained undisturbed for an age. What was that rumbling?

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_29.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_29.text: I am not surprised that this crèche has yet another defect.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_9.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_9.text: What do you mean by that?
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_9.context: NodeContext: snappy, doesn't get the insult but knows it's an insult

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_24.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_24.text: Is prattling about tremors when you have a duty not defective, vin'iisk?

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_27.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_27.text: Your crèche has much to answer for, allowing an inquisitor to be compromised.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_19.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_19.text: Our crèche did not train your inquisitor.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_1.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_1.text: I forgot you existed outside of Vlaakith's gaze, ra'stil. You are very lucky.
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_1.context: NodeContext: rah-STILL said in deep, deep sarcasm

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_15.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_15.text: I... forgot myself. I apologise, ardent.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_30.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_30.text: With your commanding officer dead, how long will you stay here?

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_6.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_6.text: Until the Inquisitor's slayer is found, and destroyed. No sooner.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_10.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_10.text: Do you have no leads? I thought you ardents were meant to be our intelligentsia.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_22.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_22.text: Do I detect insubordination in your tone, vin'iisk?

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_13.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_13.text: Hold your tongue, lest I pull it from your skull.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_33.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_33.text: What should I do if the ch'r'ai takes me in for questioning?

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_0.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_0.text: Why, have you anything to hide?

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_11.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_11.text: No, but he might scour through the whole crèche in his search.

AD_MainCheckpointChatter_4.speaker: Ardent Lin'a'an
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_4.text: Be calm, ra'stil. Those standing in truth need not fear Vlaakith's gaze.
AD_MainCheckpointChatter_4.context: NodeContext: rah-STILL said in deep, deep sarcasm

MainCheckpointTrespassing_3.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_3.text: Walk well within Crèche Y'llek, ra'stil.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_21.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_21.text: Sentries, to arms! Istik. State your purpose. Quickly.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_21.context: NodeContext: 'istik' pronounced iss-tick - "quickly" said as a threat

MainCheckpointTrespassing_83.speaker: Lae'zel
MainCheckpointTrespassing_83.text: Stand down, gish. Is it not Vlaakith's command to welcome her faithful?

MainCheckpointTrespassing_1.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_1.text: I expected no visitors, faithful or otherwise. Why have you come?

MainCheckpointTrespassing_95.speaker: Lae'zel
MainCheckpointTrespassing_95.text: We seek the zaith'isk. Show me the way.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_27.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_27.text: I have the weapon Voss was looking for, that your crèche wanted found.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_85.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_85.text: I'm on your side! Captain Voss sent me to find an item for you.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_54.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_54.text: I was infected by an illithid, and was told to seek a githyanki crèche.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_59.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_59.text: A ghaik thrall is something to eradicate, not reason with.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_109.speaker: Lae'zel
MainCheckpointTrespassing_109.text: The faithful may be purified. This is Vlaakith's protocol!

MainCheckpointTrespassing_107.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_107.text: Chk. Fine - let the ghustil carry out your fate.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_96.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_96.text: Report to the infirmary at once. And step carefully. Crèche Y'llek watches you.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_86.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_86.text: I found the weapon you seek. Want to explain to Voss why you killed me?

MainCheckpointTrespassing_62.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_62.text: You've talked to one of our queen's silver knights, and hold the lost weapon? Prove it, istik.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_111.speaker: Narrator
MainCheckpointTrespassing_111.text: *The artefact stirs within your pocket - suddenly within your reach, but reluctant to be known to the githyanki.*

MainCheckpointTrespassing_4.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_4.text: Tsk'va... It speaks truth. The inquisitor will be most pleased.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player produces the artefact before putting it away again. NodeContext: tsk-VA meaning "Shit"

MainCheckpointTrespassing_38.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_38.text: Report to the captain. She will take you to the Inquisitor.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_87.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_87.text: Ra'stil... You bring great honour on Crèche Y'llek this day. The Inquisitor will be pleased.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player produces the artefact before putting it away again. NodeContext: "rah-STILL" meaning "ally" gith

MainCheckpointTrespassing_52.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_52.text: I SPEAK AS AN AVATAR OF QUEEN VLAAKITH. YOU WILL LET ME PASS, VIN'IISK.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_69.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_69.text: ...An avatar? Of the undying regent herself? I beg your mercy, jhe'stil.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_69.context: NodeContext: ''zhe-STILL. (/ʒ/ sound on first consonant, like the "s" in "usual".)'' meaning ''superior one''

MainCheckpointTrespassing_70.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_70.text: Inquisitor W'wargaz will be honoured to meet you. Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_70.context: NodeContext: "cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith" meaning "Vlaakith's will above all"

MainCheckpointTrespassing_13.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_13.text: Silence! I will tear her name from your impure tongue.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_35.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_35.text: I was told to bring the weapon to the highest authority possible. That doesn't look like you.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_9.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_9.text: At least the weapon is here. Inquisitor W'wargaz will be pleased.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_60.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_60.text: If you are lying, it'll be a painful death. The Inquisitor is deeper in the crèche.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_24.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_24.text: Your insolent species knows nothing of authority, k'chakhi. Let me teach you.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_55.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_55.text: I will report to your kith'rak as protocol dictates. Do not forget yourself.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_104.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_104.text: Forgive me, ra'stil. Our nerves are somewhat heightened with the Inquisition's presence.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_104.context: NodeContext: "cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith" meaning "Vlaakith's will above all"

MainCheckpointTrespassing_114.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_114.text: Go, seek Inquisitor W'wargaz within. Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_5.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_5.text: Do not cite protocol to me, shka'keth.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_5.context: NodeContext: ''SHKA keth'' meaning asshole in gith

MainCheckpointTrespassing_101.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_101.text: I'm no thrall. I came here freely, didn't I?

MainCheckpointTrespassing_88.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_88.text: You are infected. A source of plague. Nothing more.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_45.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_45.text: You could turn at any moment. I will protect my kin. Hta'zith!

MainCheckpointTrespassing_43.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_43.text: I've been infected for a while. Your doctors could study me.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_32.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_32.text: The ghustil has been taking an... Unprecedented interest in the ghaik tadpoles of late.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_32.context: NodeContext: almost disgusted? these guards aren't on board with the rumours they've heard about their doctor

MainCheckpointTrespassing_102.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_102.text: Fine. Report to the infirmary. Quickly.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_77.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_77.text: Chk... It wouldn't be the strangest study she's done.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_19.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_19.text: Report to the infirmary at once. Step carefully, istik, Crèche Y'llek watches you.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_108.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_108.text: Your corpse would be just as useful, ghaik filth.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_41.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_41.text: Let me pass. Fighting me will end badly for you.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_94.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_94.text: Arrogant, for such a limited species.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_112.speaker: Narrator
MainCheckpointTrespassing_112.text: *The sentry considers you for a moment, assessing the risk you pose.*

MainCheckpointTrespassing_26.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_26.text: Very well. Perhaps Inquisitor W'wargaz could use the aid of an adventurer.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_119.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_119.text: Seek the Inquisitor within. Step lightly, istik - he's not known for his lenience.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_84.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_84.text: You githyanki hate illithid. I have proof that they're invading. We need your help.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_93.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_93.text: We are aware, and it is dire. But of late we've been distracted.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_31.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_31.text: Perhaps the news you bring will change Inquisitor W'wargaz's mind.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_46.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_46.text: I'm an unmatched killer. You want me as your ally.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_39.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_39.text: I hunt monsters. Either that's you, or it's the mind flayers - your choice.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_106.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_106.text: Try to recall and invoke the ancient githyanki war rites of parley.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_65.speaker: Lae'zel
MainCheckpointTrespassing_65.text: Faithful gish, Vlaakith gha'g shkath zai.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_65.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI. For the honour of Vlaakith.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_51.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_51.text: Shkath zai. We were not expecting visitors, kin. What brings you here?

MainCheckpointTrespassing_98.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_98.text: Halt. We were not expecting visitors, kin. What brings you here?

MainCheckpointTrespassing_61.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_61.text: Kith'rak Voss was searching for a weapon. I have it with me.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_76.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_76.text: If that is so, you succeed where others have failed.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_36.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_36.text: Kith'rak Voss instructed me to bring a weapon to our kin. I have found it.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_79.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_79.text: Ra'stil, listen. I am infected by ghaik, your mandate is to aid me.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_91.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_91.text: Kith'rak Voss entrusted me with finding a weapon. I have done so, you will let me pass.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_10.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_10.text: Is that so? His efficiency is to be commended then, as is yours.
MainCheckpointTrespassing_10.context: NodeContext: Excited, almost forgetting the stuffy gith decorum

MainCheckpointTrespassing_80.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_80.text: Produce this weapon and you may pass.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_99.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_99.text: I dare you to try. Otherwise, step aside, shka'keth.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_113.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_113.text: Chk. The Inquisitor better not hear of this. Report to the infirmary.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_42.speaker: Gish Far'aag
MainCheckpointTrespassing_42.text: You could turn at any moment. I will not let a ghaik abomination endanger my kin.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_75.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_75.text: The ceremorphosis is delayed. Your crèche's doctors would find me useful to study.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_68.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_68.text: Stand aside, or crumble in combat.

MainCheckpointTrespassing_121.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointTrespassing_121.text: There is a ghaik scourge in these lands. I need this crèche's help.

MainCheckpointWarning_1.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_1.text: You may proceed to the crèche.

MainCheckpointWarning_2.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_2.text: Talk to Gish Far'aag. She will decide your fate.

MainCheckpointWarning_6.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_6.text: Stop. We're not finished with your companion over there.

MainCheckpointWarning_11.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_11.text: Halt. Zech... You are gith? State your business.

MainCheckpointWarning_18.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_18.text: Halt. One step further and I end your primitive existence.

MainCheckpointWarning_9.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointWarning_9.text: I have important business with your Kith'rak. Step aside.

MainCheckpointWarning_7.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_7.text: At Crèche Y'llek? Report to Kith'rak Therezzyn. Quickly.

MainCheckpointWarning_21.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointWarning_21.text: Captain Voss sent me in search of a weapon. I am bringing it to this crèche.

MainCheckpointWarning_5.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_5.text: An istik? A curious choice, if indeed he sent you.

MainCheckpointWarning_16.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_16.text: Enter, and seek Kith'rak Therezzyn. If you are lying, you will not return.

MainCheckpointWarning_4.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointWarning_4.text: Captain Voss was searching for an item. I have it.

MainCheckpointWarning_20.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_20.text: Is that so? Then his efficiency is to be commended. As is  yours.

MainCheckpointWarning_15.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_15.text: Excellent work, ra'stil. Enter, and seek Kith'rak Therezzyn.

MainCheckpointWarning_8.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointWarning_8.text: A nautiloid crashed on your doorstep. Illithids are infecting the population. I need your help.

MainCheckpointWarning_14.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_14.text: Kith'rak Therezzyn shares your concerns. You should seek her within.

MainCheckpointWarning_0.speaker: Player
MainCheckpointWarning_0.text: My apologies, I'll get out of here.

MainCheckpointWarning_19.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_19.text: I'm afraid you will not, istik.

MainCheckpointWarning_13.speaker: Warrior Khunaruth
MainCheckpointWarning_13.text: Wait. Report to our kith'rak first, she may have use of you.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_2.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_2.context: NodeContext: Tsk'va pronounced tsk-VA - means "shit" - the gith are surprised here

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_32.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_32.text: Ah, you are kin. State your purpose.
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_32.context: NodeContext: First part of the line is happy surprise

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_52.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_52.text: Journey's over, istik. It'll be swift.
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_52.context: NodeContext: Moving from the initial surprise to the Gith aggression/authority

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_55.speaker: Lae'zel
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_55.text: I must speak with your ghustil. Our queen's protocol demands it.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_41.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_41.text: I simply seek to meet more of my kin, it has been too long.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_27.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_27.text: An understandable longing. Report to our Kith'rak within, she may have use for you.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_11.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_11.text: Wait! I've been infected by an illithid, and I need your help.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_36.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_36.text: An illithid abomination will not step foot in this crèche.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_6.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_6.text: I have the weapon Captain Voss was looking for.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_49.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_49.text: You spoke to a silver sword - and you still live? Curious. We shall see what Kith'rak Therezzyn makes of this.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_38.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_38.text: If you bring harm, she will cut you in two. Seek her within.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_12.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_12.text: 'Mercy' is a weakness we do not suffer from.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_10.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_10.text: I have not transformed yet, and it's been ages. Your medics would find me useful.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_29.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_29.text: Quite possible.  Enter then, and report to the infirmary. Do not stray, Crèche Y'llek watches you.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_46.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_46.text: Your corpse will be useful enough.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_7.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_7.text: Kith'rak Voss said you're looking for a weapon, I've brought it with me.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_48.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_48.text: Is that so? I had heard he had his ways, and I'm pleased that they bear the promised results.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_31.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_31.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. Enter and report to Kith'rak Therezzyn.
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_31.context: NodeContext: pronounced 'cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith' (meaning 'Vlaakith's will above all')

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_40.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_40.text: A ghaik parasite has infected me. Your crèche will offer me sanctuary, as is its mandate.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_53.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_53.text: Report to the infirmary. Ghustil Stornugoss will see to you.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_33.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_33.text: Ghaik have infected these lands. I need this crèche's help stopping them.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_3.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_3.text: Captain Voss won't be happy you killed the person who found your lost weapon.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_35.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_35.text: Chk. We are never informed first. But if Kith'rak Voss wanted you alive, he must have had his reasons.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_37.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_37.text: Very well, enter. Seek Kith'rak Therezzyn within.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_56.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_56.text: Captain Voss told me to find the item you've been searching for. I have it.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_18.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_18.text: Let me past. It'll save both of us time and you a lot of blood.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_42.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_42.text: Hah! You've a strong spirit, istik. Go, report to our captain, she might have use for you.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_51.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_51.text: I seek no quarrel with you, kin. Go, speak with our Kith'rak, she might require your help.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_26.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_26.text: There is no greater honour than bleeding for Vlaakith.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_4.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_4.text: Wait! A nautiloid crashed on your doorstep. People are getting infected by mind flayers. I need help.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_20.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_20.text: Perhaps you could be of use to her. Seek her within.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_21.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_21.text: You would ask us for help?

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_39.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_39.text: As stupid as you are unfortunate. Htak'a!

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_47.speaker: Player
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_47.text: Took a wrong turn - I'll just be leaving.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_5.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_5.text: Wait. First, report to our Kith'rak, she might have need of you.

HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_34.speaker: Raider G'r'ath
HiddenCheckpointTrespassing_34.text: I see they're letting even istik mercenaries in these days.
